name: Full Throttle 2022
description:
Description:

A game prototype made during the 2021-22 school year over a two week period. In the game, you drive along an infinite track, dodging obstacles and picking up power-ups. You can't slow down, so see how far you can make it before you run out of fuel!

Instructions:

  • A to move left, D to move right
  • Blue boost gives speed boost even when you're at max speed
  • Run out of gas and you lose

Creators:

  • Andrew D.
  • Melanie B.
  • Sim M.
